power.title: Arrow Marks the Spot
power.fluff: You fire a shot that divert's your foes attention, giving your ally the chance to attack

section.name: Target:
section.target: you, one ally in your warlord's aura, and one enemy in the burst

power.section: true Effect:You make a ranged basic attack against the target enemy.

The target ally either charges or makes a melee basic attack attack against the target enemy as an opportunity reaction. He or she deals additional damage on the attack equal to your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.
true 1 Inspiring Presence:If either you or the target ally bloodied the target enemy, the target ally gains temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.
true 1 Skirmishing Presence:The target ally gains a bonus to all defenses triggered by making a charge attack as part of this power. The bonus equals your Intelligence modifier.
true 1 Tactical Presence:The target ally gains a bonus to the attack roll equal to one-half your Intelligence modifier.

power.title: Diabolic Stratagem
power.fluff: A feint draws an opponent's attention and seemingly leaves you defenseless, but it is just a cunning ploy
power.section: true Effect:You mark the target until the end of your next turn.

true Until the end of the encounter, while the target is marked by you, it gains combat advantage on attacks that only target you, but its attacks against you trigger reactive strikes from your allies.
true The target is not aware that its attacks trigger reactive strikes before at least one has been made against it.

power.title: Hammer and Anvil
power.fluff: You press hard on an enemy, encouraging a nearby ally to do the same, even harder

section.name: Target:
section.target: you, one ally in your warlord's aura, and one enemy in your reach

power.section: true Effect:You make a melee basic attack against the target enemy. If the target ally is bloodied, you deal additional damage equal to your [Wisdom or Charisma] modifier.
The target ally can make a basic attack against the target enemy as an opportunity reaction. The attack deals additional damage equal to your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.
true 1 Inspiring Presence:If you are bloodied, the target ally deals additional damage equal to your Charisma modifier instead.
true 1 Skirmishing Presence:The target ally can shift a number of squares equal to one-half your Intelligence modifier either before or after making the attack.
true 1 Tactical Presence:The target ally gains a +2 bonus to the attack roll, or +4 if your attack was a critical hit.

power.title: Inspired Offensive
power.fluff: Your eyes meet your ally's as he or she looks to you for inspiration, and the message is clear: 'We fight!'
power.section: Trigger:An ally uses your draw inspiration power
true Effect:The target's first attack before the end of his or her current turn deals an additional +1[W] damage (or +1d8 if it is not a Weapon attack).
true 1 Inspiring Presence:Choose one defense. The target also gains a power bonus to that defense equal to your Charisma modifier until the end of his or her next turn.
true 1 Resourceful Presence:The target gains a bonus to all defenses equal to one-half your Wisdom modifier until the end of his or her next turn.

true 1 Skirmishing Presence:The target also gains a +2 bonus to speed, and gains a bonus to all defenses against attacks triggered by movement equal to your Intelligence modifier. These bonuses last until the end of his or her next turn.
true 1 Tactical Presence:The target's first attack before the end of his or her current turn also gains a bonus to all attack rolls equal to one-half your Intelligence modifier.

power.title: Leaf on the Wind
power.fluff: As if your enemies were leaves on the wind, your commands blow them away before your allies

section.name: Target:
section.target: one ally in your warlord's aura

power.section: true Effect:The first melee attack the target makes before the end of his or her next turn deals additional damage equal to +1[W] (or +1d8 if it is not a Weapon attack).
true Additionally, the target can push one creature it hits with the attack up to 1 square and shift the same distance into a space adjacent to the creature.
true If the target's attack already pushes, increase the push by 1 square instead and the ally also gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll.
true 1 Inspiring Presence:The creature hit by the target takes a penalty to all attack rolls for the first attack it makes before the end of its next turn. The penalty equals your Charisma modifier.
true 1 Skirmishing Presence:The target can push or increase the push by a number of squares equal to one-half your Intelligence modifier.

power.title: Myrmidon Formation
power.fluff: Knowing that regrouping increases morale, you call your allies to gather together
power.section: true Effect:Until the end of your next turn, your warlord's aura gains the following benefits:
true 1 You and allies in the aura gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls when attacking an enemy threatened by an ally.
true 2 Tactical Presence:The attack bonus equals one-half your Intelligence modifier.
You and alies in the aura deal additional damage with melee attacks. The damage equals the number of allies adjacent to the target of the melee attack.
true 1 When adjacent to you or an ally, you and allies in the aura gain a +2 power bonus to AC. This increases to +3 when adjacent to you and another ally or two allies.
true 2 Inspiring Presence:The power bonus also applies to Will
true 1 Skirmishing Presence:You and allies gain a bonus to all defenses against reactive strikes while adjacent to you or another ally. The bonus equals your Intelligence modifier.

power.title: Nimble Footwork
power.fluff: You step to one side, allowing an ally to slip closer

section.name: Target:
section.target: you, and one ally in your warlord's aura

power.section: 1 Skirmishing Presence:you, and up to two allies
true Effect:You shift a number of squares equal to one-half your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier (minimum 1 square).

true The target ally deals +1[W] (or +1d8 if it is not a Weapon attack) on his or her first melee attack against any enemy you were adjacent to before the shift. The attack must come before the end of your next turn.

power.title: Overwhelming Trap
power.fluff: You keep the order to spring the trap ready, allowing your ally to spring into action on a moment's notice
power.section: Trigger:An ally in your warlord's aura makes a melee basic attack
true Effect:The target uses one of his or her melee at-will attack powers in place of the melee basic attack.
true If the attack hits, the target of the triggering attack is also dazed until the end of the triggering ally's next turn.

power.title: Powerful Warning
power.fluff: Your watchful eyes notice a flaw in an enemy's swing
power.section: Trigger:An enemy in your warlord's aura targets you or an ally with an attack

section.name: Target:
section.target: the targets of the triggering attack

power.section: true Effect:The targets add one-half your [Wisdom or Charisma] modifier to their AC and Reflex against the triggering attack.
true 1 Inspiring Presence:Equal to your Charisma modifier.
true 1 Resourceful Presence:Targets also gain a bonus to Fortitude and Will against the triggering attack equal to one-half your Wisdom modifier.
true Each target that is hit by the triggering attack gain a +2 bonus to his or her first attack roll against the triggering enemy. The attack must come before the end of his or her next turn.
true 1 Skirmishing Presence: bold Targets that are hit can shift a number of squares equal to one-half your Intelligence modifier as a free reaction.
true 1 Tactical Presence:The bonus equals your Intelligence modifier.

true After the triggering attack has been resolved, choose one ally in your warlord's aura. That ally can make a basic attack against the triggering enemy as an opportunity reaction. He or she gains a bonus to the damage roll equal to twice the number of allies (including you) hit by the triggering attack.
true 1 Inspiring Presence:If the triggering attack targeted a bloodied ally or bloodied at least one target, the chosen ally's attack deals additional damage equal to your Charisma modifier.

power.title: Provocative Order
power.fluff: You prompt an ally to take the fight to the enemy

section.name: Target:
section.target: one enemy in the burst, and one ally in your warlord's aura

power.section: true Effect:The target ally makes a charge attack against the target enemy, and deals +1[W] damage on the attack (or +1d8 if the attack is not a Weapon attack).

power.title: Seize the Upper Hand
power.fluff: You press your advantage against a foe, or force it to concentrate on its advantage against you at the cost of its defense
power.section: true Effect:Until the end of your next turn, your warlord's aura gains the following benefits:

true 1 When you make an attack against an enemy and have combat advantage for the attack, allies in the aura have a bonus to damage against that enemy until the end of your following turn. The bonus equals one-half your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.

true 1 When an enemy makes an attack against you and it has combat advantage for the attack, allies in the aura have a bonus to damage against that enemy until the start of the enemy's next turn. The bonus equals one-half your [Wisdom or Charisma] modifier.
Allies can benefit from both bonuses against the same enemy.

power.title: Shielded Assault
power.fluff: You shield yourself and nearby allies, giving one of them a chance for a telling blow
power.section: Prerequisite:You must have the opportune command class power.
Requirement:You must be using a shield.
true Effect:You gain a +2 power bonus to AC until the end of your next turn. You lose this bonus if you stop using a shield.
true While you have this bonus, allies adjacent to you have a +2 bonus to AC.
true 1 Inspiring Presence:The allies gain a bonus equal to your Charisma modifier.
true 1 Resourceful Presence:Allies instead gain a bonus to all defenses equal to one-half your Wisdom modifier (minimum +2 bonus).
You use your opportune command class power. If the target ally is adjacent to you and makes a melee attack, he or she deals +1[W] damage (or +1d8 if it is not a Weapon attack).

power.title: Vengeance is Mine
power.fluff: You respond to an enemy's attack with a riposte, and call for an ally to join you against the offender
power.section: Tactical Presence:You can use this power as an immediate interrupt.
Trigger:An enemy hits you with an attack, or hits an ally in your warlord's aura with an attack

section.name: Target:
section.target: you or one ally; the target must be hit by the triggering attack

power.section: true Effect:The target makes a basic attack against the triggering enemy. This ia a free interrupt if the target is an ally.
true 1 Inspiring Presence:The target gains a bonus to the damage roll of his or her attack equal to your Charisma modifier.
true 1 Skirmishing Presence:Before making the attack, the target can either move a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier, or shift half the distance.

power.title: Warlord's Favour
power.fluff: With a precise offense, you leave an enemy open for a comrade's blow

section.name: Target:
section.target: one ally in your warlord's aura, and one enemy in the burst

power.section: true Effect:You make a basic attack against the target enemy.
The target ally gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls against the target enemy. This bonus lasts until the end of your next turn.
true 1 Tactical Presence:Equal to your Intelligence modifier.
true The first time the target ally hits the target enemy before the end of your next turn, he or she deals an extra +1[W] damage (or +1d8 if the attack is not a Weapon attack).
true 1 Inspiring Presence:The target ally also gains temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.
true 1 If the target is bloodied, he or she regains that many hit points instead and this power gains the Healing keyword.
true 1 Resourceful Presence:The target also gain a bonus to all defenses against the chosen enemy. The bonus equals one-half your Wisdom modifier and lasts until the end of your next turn.
true 1 Skirmishing Presence:Until the end of your next turn, the target can shift a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier as a move action.
